text: 34|37|ninnalute sampattukkalum ninnalute santanannalumeannum nam'mute atukkal ninnalkk samipyamuntakkittarunnavayalla. visvasikkukayum nallat pravarttikkukayum ceytavarkkealike. attarakkarkk tannal pravartticcatinre phalamayi iratti pratiphalamunt‌. avar unnata sedhannalil nirbhayarayi kaliyunnatuman‌
